title: Please help me my acount got hacked
body: Someone hacked me please help me my acount names is --snip--

replies.body: Hey I edited out your account name for security reasons.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help with recovery.  We'll reply back as soon as we can, hang tight!
